headline: Observable: Visualizations for fun and testing
text: Playground for prototyping new visualization features, reporting tools and interesting data.

headline: Deer accidents
text: Annual analysis and data graphics on deer crashes across the state of Wisconsin.

headline: Calculate how you can save with a 529 account
text: Calculator to go with solutions based series on 529 college savings plans.

headline: How the two Milwaukee Bucks championship teams compare
text: A graphic story comparing the two Milwaukee Bucks NBA championship teams, 50 years apart.
role: Research, analysis, digital and print graphics.

headline: How Milwaukee residents view defunding the police, what it means
text: A survey and breakdown of how Milwaukee residents feel about defunding the police.

headline: Electrical fires hit Milwaukee's Black renters hardest. Nobody is held accountable.
text: An investigation of electrical fires in Milwaukee's poorest neighborhoods.
role: Series design, graphics and project management.

headline: A timeline of how the COVID-19 pandemic has played out in Wisconsin
text: A look back at one year of COVID in Wisconsin.

headline: Track COVID-19 and the vaccine in Wisconsin
text: An evolving dashboard of daily cases, deaths, vaccines and more.
role: Page design, graphic and data updates.

headline: Abuse of Trust
text: An investigation into conflicts of interest in Milwaukee's Fire and Police Commission. Eppy Award (2021) for Best innovation project on a website.
role: Series design, network graphics, social sharing graphics and project management.

headline: In the Shadows
text: An investigation into hospital parking garages and the safety of employees and patients.
role: Series design, graphics and project management.

headline: Voter Guide
text: Frequently Asked Questions and information about voting in the 2020 general election.
role: Page design, development, map graphic, social sharing graphics and FAQ content updating.

headline: These are just a fraction of the people Wisconsin lost to COVID in a single week
text: Looking back at the lives lost during a short span in November 2020.

headline: How Coronavirus is affecting Wisconsin
text: A by-the-numbers graphic breakdown of how the first couple months of the pandemic affected the city.
role: Data requests, analysis and converting graphics for print and social.

headline: Out-of-state landlords are gobbling up Milwaukee homes to rent out
text: An analysis of absentee landlords around Milwaukee's neighborhoods.

headline: How many of Milwaukee's top restaurants have you eaten at?
text: An interactive guide to Milwaukee's best restaurants according to our food critic.

headline: Dairyland in Distress
text: A collection of a year's worth of reporting on Wisconsinâ€™s dairy industry. SABEW 2019 Best in Business reporting award.
role: Series design, development, project management and production. Individual data graphic contributions.

headline: Lessons Lost
text: Tracking the impact of student mobility on performance. Online News Association 2019 The University of Florida Award for Investigative Data Journalism.
role: Series design, graphics and project management.
awards: 2019 The University of Florida Award for Investigative Data Journalism, Online Journalism Awards

headline: 50-year Ache
text: An interactive historical look at Milwaukee 50 years after the 1967 civil rights marches.

headline: Mexico Blackouts
text: A database of submitted blackout level incidents at popular Mexico resorts.

headline: Unsolved
text: A true-crime podcast produced for three seasons. A National Edward R. Murrow, ASNE and SPJ Sigma Delta Chi award winner.
role: Project management, design and development for three seasons.

headline: Beer Near
text: An interactive guide to every Wisconsin brewery and brewpub.

headline: Rainy spring, cold winter help buoy Great Lakes levels
text: Reporting on the Great Lakes as part of a Marquette O'Brien Fellowship internship.
